SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractContext
AbstractContext interface ensures the implementation of a method to set the state of an FSM of a State Pattern
Action
Action abstract class defines messages which are used in a listeners-posters system between Model, View and Controller
ActionAgent
ActionAgent interface is used to define whoever is able to "do" an Action.
ActionListener
Interface that ensures the implementation of a method to answer to a notification post in a "listeners" architecture
ActionPoster
Interface that ensures the implementation of methods to handle a collection of listeners in a "listeners" architecture
ActiveAimCardChoiceState
In this state the client select which aimCard he wants between the two options A AimCardChoiceMessage with the user input will be sent back
ActiveDealCardsState
In this state the client ask the server for his 3 cards
ActiveDrawChoiceState
In this state the client choose which card to draw
ActivePlacingCardChoiceState
In this state the client choose which card he wants to place
ActivePlacingCardToCoverChoiceState
In this state the client choose which card to cover in his private board
ActivePlacingCornerCoverState
In this state client decide which corner cover on the card in his board
ActivePlacingFaceChoiceState
In this state the client decide on which face placing his card
ActiveStartingCardChoiceState
In this state after showing the client his starting card he will choose if place this card face up or face down
ActiveTokenChoiceState
In this state the client choose which is the token he wants
AimCard
The AimCard class defines the aim cards, which indicate the private and public aims for the players in the game.
AimCardChoiceAction
This class represent the Action made by the Server in response of an input by the network from the Client that chooses his personal AimCard
AimCardChoiceActionBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the AimCardChoiceAction class.
AimCardChoiceData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
AimCardChoiceMessage
This message contains the ID of the personal aim card chosen by the client
AimCardInfoAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface about the two AimCards from which he will have to choose one to keep
AimCardInfoData
This data is used to send from server to client the information of the aim card that the client has to choose
AimCardInfoMessage
This message contains the two aim cards for the client choice
AimCardRequestAction
This class serves as a mean to notify the Server that the Active Client needs information about the two AimCards from which he has to choose
AimCardRequestActionBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the AimCardRequestAction class
AimCardRequestData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
AimCardRequestMessage
It's the message that ask the server to send the two aim cards The client will choose which one of the two aim cards he wants
AimCardResultAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface that the AimCard that the Player wants is correctly selected
AimCardResultData
This data is sent to the client to confirm his aim card decision
AimCardResultMessage
Represents a message indicating that an aim card has been selected by a client
AimChecker
Interface for the strategy pattern It requests all the other classes on the strategy pattern to implement the method check The method check will be chosen based on the runtime type of the aimCard
AimCheckerDiagonalPattern
Class that implements the method for calculating how many times the diagonal pattern occurs in a player grid
AimCheckerLPattern
Class that implements the method for calculating how many times the L pattern occurs in a player grid
AimCheckerResource
Class that implements the method for calculating how many times the resource pattern occurs in a player grid
AimStrategyTest
Test class for aim strategy pattern
BoardsController
 
Card
The Card abstract class defines all the cards used in the game
CardElements
The CardElements Enum class defines the elements of the game.
CardFace
The CardFace Enum class defines the orientation of the card (if it's played by its front face, or by its back face)
ChangeTurnInfoAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface that the turn has changed on the model
ChangeTurnInfoData
This data is sent to let the clients knows who is the next player
ChangeTurnRequestAction
This class represent the Action made by the Server in response of a Data sent on the network by the Client that has just finished his round and confirms the fact that his round is ended to the model
ChangeTurnRequestActionBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the ChangeTurnRequestAction class.
ChangeTurnRequestData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
ChangeTurnRequestMessage
This message is sent by the client after he finished is turn
ChangeTurnResponseMessage
This message is sent by the server, and it says that the active client is changed
ChooseGameState
This state ask the client which game he wants to join after showing him the list of all possible game he can join
Client
Client class is the main class of the client.
ClientAlreadyLoggedException
Exception that occurs when a client is already logged in a Party.
ClientDisconnectedAction
This class represents the Action made by the server after a client has disconnected.
ClientDisconnectedData
This data is sent by the client when he quit the game
ClientDisconnectedMessage
This message is sent by the client that quit the game
ClientHandlerTCP
Class which implements the running listening logic for a specific client TCP
ClientNetworkRMIManager
Concrete network protocol implementation for RMI
ClientNetworkTCPManager
Concrete network protocol implementation for TCP
CodexNaturalis
 
CodexNaturalisClient
The class which contains the main method for our application on the client
CodexNaturalisServer
The class which contains the main method for our application on the server
Color
The Color Enum class defines the colors for Token class, that are chosen by the players at the beginning of the game.
CommonBoard
 
CommonBoardTest
The CommonBoardTest class contains test methods for the CommonBoard class
ConcreteContext
The classes which implement ConcreteContext interface can execute the instructions of a state
Coordinates
The Coordinates class defines the position of the cards in the grid in the private board, which also allow the player to know where he can place the next card.
CoverageScoreType
The CoverageScoreType class implements the method calculate() declared in the ScoreTypeInterface as a member of the Strategy Pattern.
CreateRequestAction
This class represents the Action made by the Server when the respective Data is sent on the network demanding the creation of a new party of players
CreateRequestData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
CreateRequestMessage
Thi message is sent to request a creation of the game
CreateResponseMessage
This message is sent by the server, and it's an ack that he had created a new game
CreateResultData
This data is sent to the client to confirm the creation of a new game
CreateState
In this state the client has to choose how many players he wants in the new game that is going to be created
CreatorRemotionException
Exception that occurs when something is trying to remove the creator from a party
Data
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
DealCardsData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
DealCardsRequestAction
This class represent the Action made by the Server after the Token selection phase that gives to a Player his 2 ResourceCards and 1 GoldResourceCard as the rules say
DealCardsRequestActionBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the DealCardsRequestAction class
DealCardsRequestMessage
This message is used to ask the server the 3 cards of the player hand
DealCardsResponseMessage
This message is used to give the client his 3 cards
DealCardsResultAction
This class serves as a mean of the notification to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface after cards dealing during the first Round and this class carries the information of the Cards Drawn and the new Cards on the top of the ResourceCard and GoldenResourceCard Decks
DealCardsResultData
This data is sent to the client to give him his 3 hand cards
DecidePlayerOrderRequestMessage
This message is sent to the server to asks for the player order for the rounds of the game
DecidePlayerOrderResponse
This message is sent by the server and tells the order of the players
Deck<T>
This class represents the deck of the commonBoard
DeckBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the Deck class
DeckTest
Test class for the Deck class
DrawAction
This class represent the action performed by the Server after receiving via network a DRAW command from the Client.
DrawActionBlackBoxTest
 
DrawData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
DrawMessage
This message contains all the parameters that the model need in the draw phase
EdgeState
The EdgeState Enum class defines the state of the edges of a card; each player chooses, during his personal round, how to cover the edges of a card
EndGameAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface and carries the information about the winner of the Game.
EndGameController
 
EndGameData
This data is sent at the end of the game
EndGameMessage
This message is sent at the end game
EndGameTest
This class contains tests for the Game class regarding the emd game part
FailedCreationData
This data is sent when something went wrong with the creation of the game
FailedCreationMessage
This message is sent by the server went something went wrong with the creation of the game
FailedGameIDData
This data is sent when a client tries to join a full match
FailedGameIDMessage
This message is sent by the server when something went wrong when joining a match
FailedHostNameData
This data is sent to the client if he chooses an host name that has already been registered on the server
FailedHostNameMessage
This message is sent by the server if the client choose a host name that is already logged in the server
ForceEndgameTurnException
Exception to force the end of the game
Game
The Game class is the entry point from the controller and manages the correct flow of the game.
GameBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the Game class
GameIDChoiceAction
This class represents the Action made by the Server when the respective Data is sent on the network carrying the information of what party does the Client that sent the Data wants to join
GameIDChoiceData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
GameIdChoiceMessage
This message contains the ID of the game that the client wants to join
GameIdResponseMessage
This message is sent by the server, and it's an ack that client joined the game he chose
GameIDResultData
This data is sent to confirm the gameID choice
GameInitResultAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the clients by using the Network interface about the situation on the board when the Game is started
GameInitResultData
This data is sent to start the game
GameManager
The GameManager class is the "interface" of the controller in an O.O.
GameManagerBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the GameManager class
GeneralController
This class is used as an interface that keeps all the methods that can be called on the GUI by the GUIManager.
GoldResourceCard
The GoldResourceCard is a child class of ResourceCard; it defines the golden resource cards, which are placeable objects during the game.
GraphicResourceFetcher
This class purpose is to serve as URL builder and interpreter for the GUI, in order to link the Application and the resources
GUIApplication
This class represent the launch site for the GUI Application
GUIManager
The GUIManager is the class which make possible to display the information and to manage the inputs with JavaFX
HostNameAction
This class represents the Action made by the server just after a client is connected in order to set his username, by checking his identity by the ipAddress and the port or the skeleton, depending on which mode he is connected tah
HostNameData
This data is sent to the server, and it contains the client information
HostNameMessage
This message is sent by the client to let the server know is host name
IllegalValueException
Exception that occurs when network choice isn't valid.
InGameController
This class is the controller of the main Game scene from where the players play the game
InitializationAction
This class represents the Action made by the Server when a Party reaches the desired amount of players selected by the Client that created the Party
InitializationActionBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the InitializationAction class
InterruptedGameData
This data is sent to the client to interrupt the game
InterruptedGameMessage
This message is sent by the server to interrupt the game
InterruptedGameState
This state show up the interrupted game condition (a client has disconnected)
IntroController
This class is the controller of the intro scene
InvalidArgsPrefsException
Exception that occurs when args prefs aren't valid.
InvalidJSONPrefsException
Exception that occurs when JSON prefs aren't valid.
JoinRequestAction
This class represents the Action made by the Server when the respective Data is sent on the network carrying the request made by a client to join a party.
JoinRequestData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
JoinRequestMessage
This message is used to send a join request
JoinResponseData
This data is used to let the client know that the join worked
JoinResponseMessage
This message is sent by the server in order to let the client know all the possible games he can join
JSONCardLoader
The JSONCardLoader class import the decks from the JSON file "Cards"
LastRoundInfoMessage
This message is used for letting the player know that a player has a score from of more than 20 points or the plates are empty so the final rounds are started
LastRoundsInfoAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface.
LastRoundsInfoData
This data is sent when the game enter the last rounds
LoginController
This class is the controller of the login scene
Message
This represents the abstract idea of a Message that is how the parts of the client communicate
ModelException
Class from which all the exception on the model extends
NetworkClient
Class which represents a client from the network on the server
NetworkFactory
The NetworkFactory class is used to actuate the factory pattern for the network protocol.
NetworkFactoryException
Exception that occurs when it isn't possible to create the concrete network manager object.
NetworkManagerClient
The NetworkManagerInterface defines methods that each class which communicates through the network with a specific protocol must implement
NetworkManagerServer
Interface NetworkManagerServer ensures methods to manage the communications on the network and to handle incoming requests from clients
NetworkParty
Class which represents a party (lobby) on the server.
NetworkProblemException
Exception which represents a generic problem with the connection to the server
NetworkServerCutOffException
Exception throws in case of a server cut off
NetworkStreams
 
NoActivePartiesData
This data is sent when a client tries to join a game without any game created
NoActivePartiesMessage
This message is sent by the server when a client tries to join a game but there are no game available to be joined
NonExistentClientException
Exception that occurs when the reference to a client doesn't exist.
NonExistentPartyException
Exception that occurs when the reference to a party doesn't exist.
NormalScoreType
The NormalScoreType class implements the method calculate() declared in the ScoreTypeInterface as a member of the Strategy Pattern.
NotEnoughPlayerMessage
This message is used to tell the player that the game is not starting, and he has to wait other players
NotEnoughPlayersData
This data is sent to tell the client to wait for other players
ObjectScoreType
The ObjectScoreType class implements the method calculate() declared in the ScoreTypeInterface as a member of the Strategy Pattern.
PassiveAimCardChoiceState
In this state the client wait for the others to choose their aim card
PassiveDealCardsState
In this state the client wait for the others to get their 3 cards
PassivePlacingState
In this state the client wait for the others to place and draw a card
PassiveStartingCardChoiceState
In this state the client wait for the others to choose their starting card face
PassiveTokenChoiceState
In this state the client wait for the others to choose their token
PingData
 
PlacingAction
This class represent the action performed by the Server after receiving via network a PLACING command from the Client.

Test class with Black-box unit tests for the PlacingAction class.
PlacingData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
PlacingMessage
This message has all the parameters needed for the placing phase
Player
The Player class manages the player in the game, giving to the Game class the information about who is playing.
PlayerBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the Player class
PlayersOrderInfoAction
This class serves as a mean of the notification to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface about the player order in the game
PlayersOrderInfoData
This data is sent to the client to tell the order of the players in the round
PlayersOrderRequestAction
This class represents the Action made by the Server when the Players have chosen their AimCard and, as the rules say, the turn order needs a shuffle
PlayersOrderRequestActionBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the PlayersOrderRequestAction class
PlayersOrderRequestData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
PositiveDrawAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface.
PositiveDrawData
This data is sent to updates the clients after a positive draw
PositiveDrawMessage
This message is sent from the server, and it contains all the updates of the game after a draw
PositivePlacingAction
This class represent the action response made by the Server after executing a positive placing phase.
PositivePlacingData
This data is used to updates the clients after a placing
PositivePlacingMessage
This message is sent by the server, and it contains all the updates due to the placing
PositiveTokenColorAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface that the user has correctly selected his token color
PositiveTokenColorData
This data confirm the choice of the token made by the client
PositiveTokenColorMessage
This message is sent by the server to the client, and it is an okay on the choice of the client token
PrivateBoard
The PrivateBoard class represents the place where a Player keeps all the cards and contains, also, all the data related the game logic.
Protocol
Options for the client network
Protocol
Enum to define how each client is connected to the server
ReadyToPlayAction
This class represents the Action made by the Server when the respective Data is sent on the network carrying the information that a Client is ready to play and is waiting for the Game to start
ReadyToPlayData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
ReadyToPlayMessage
This message is used for the client to let the server know he wants to start the game The server will respond with start game or waiting for other player
ReadyToPlayState
In this state the client send a message to the server that is ready to play The server will respond with a StartingGame message if the number of players it's okay
ReadyToRoundState
This state is used to wait for all the client doing their first round of the game
RemoteInterfaceClient
Interface RemoteInterfaceClients is used by the server to call methods on the client (RMI).
RemoteInterfaceServer
Interface RemoteInterfaceServer is used by the client to call methods on the server (RMI).
RemoteObjectClient
RemoteObjectClient class is the concrete implementation of the RemoteInterfaceClient for RMI.
RemoteObjectServer
RemoteObjectServer class is the concrete implementation of the RemoteInterfaceServer for RMI.
RepeatDrawAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface.
RepeatDrawData
This message is sent to the client to tell him that something went wrong with the draw
RepeatDrawException
Exception for repeating a draw after something went wrong
RepeatDrawMessage
It's a message that tells the client that something went wrong during the place
RepeatPlacingAction
This class serves as a mean to notify to the VirtualView which then will notify the client by using the Network interface.
RepeatPlacingData
This message is sent to the client to tell him that something went wrong with the placing
RepeatPlacingException
Exception that makes the client repeat placing after something went wrong during placing
RepeatPlacingMessage
This message is used to tell the client that something went wrong during the placing phase
ResourceCard
The ResourceCard is a child class of Cards; it defines the resource cards, which are placeable objects during the game.
ResourceCardBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the ResourceCard class
ScoreType
The ScoreType class is the entry point for the Strategy Pattern ued for the ResourceCard and the GoldResourceCards.
ServerNetworkRMIManager
 
ServerNetworkTCPManager
ServerNetworkTCPManager is the class which manage communications (server-side) through TCP Socket protocol
SetUpState
In the set-up state the client decide if joining an existing game or create a new one The message send back will be a CreateMessage or a JoinMessage
SmallCard
Representation of the card for the client
SmallCardLoader
Class used to load the cards on the client
SmallModel
Class for saving the information of the game that a client needs
StartingCard
The Starting Card is a child class of Resource Card; it defines the starting cards, which are the initial placeable cards on the grid.
StartingCardBlackBoxTest
Test class with Black-box unit tests for the StartingCard class
StartingCardChoiceAction
This class represent the Action made by the Server in response of an input coming through the network made by the Client that chooses the face of his StartingCard

This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
StartingCardChoiceMessage

This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.

StartingCardResultAction

StartingCardResultData
This message is sent to the client to confirm his choice on the face of the starting card
StartingCardResultMessage
This message contains the ID of the starting card given to the client and the face on which he placed it and all the information related
StartingGameMessage
This message is sent from the server, and it is used to start the game

The State interface is useful for the State Pattern
Streams
This class represents the private input and output Streams of a Client
Token
The Token class models the game piece of a player in the game.
TokenChoiceAction
This class represent the Action made by the Server in response of an input coming through the network made by the Client that chooses the Color of his Token

TokenInfoData

TokenInfoMessage
This message contains the list of the color of the possible tokens that the client can choose
TokenRequestAction
This class represents the Action made by the Server when a Player asks for information on the Token that he has to choose in the first round as a part of the setup
TokenRequestActionBlackBoxTest
with black-box unit tests for TokenRequestAction class.
TokenRequestData
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network.
TokenRequestMessage
This message is a request from the client to the server in which the client asks the list of the token he can choose
TUIManager
The TUIManager is the class which make possible to display the information and to manage the inputs with a command line interface on the console
TurnException
Exception that occurs if something goes wrong during the change turn
UserInputReader
This is the class used to read the input of a client
UsernameChoiceState
In this state the client set his username
ViewFactory
The ViewFactory class is used to actuate the factory pattern for the view graphic interface.
ViewFactoryException
Exception that occurs when it isn't possible to create the concrete view manager object.
ViewManager
The ViewManager interface forces the implementers to have methods to show something in the user interface and to be able to manage incoming user inputs
VVServer
VirtualView/Server class is the main junction between the network and tha MVC pattern.
